name: Old Gold 3D - action rpg dungeon quest game
name_original: Old Gold 3D - action rpg dungeon quest game
description:
It's the modern game with the old combat style, return you back in time to the days of first 3D shooter games.

Delve into an underground realm of Undead King in search of Old Gold.
Your hero will be able to journey through dungeons full of rare items and treasure chests.
Engage in battles with awful beasts and hordes of skeleton warriors while exploring catacombs.
You start your quests with one of the weapon like: broken sword, rocks, dagger, throwing knives,sword, bow, mace, magic staff and spear.
You need to use specific advantages of weapons in order to be more effective against evil monsters.
Over the course of the game, improve your combat skill of sword fighting and bow shooting to defeat the army of Undead King and destroy him once and for all!

This game is for all fans of 3D action games, FPS games(First-Person Shooters), RPG games, and for all those who like to fight undead creatures.
